h2_title: Black Wind Mountain Luojia Fragrant Vines
h3_title: Marsh of the White Mist Luojia Fragrant Vine
content: The first Luojia Fragrant Vine in the game can be found amongst the bamboo just opposite the Marsh of the White Mist Keeper's Shrine.
